member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client.SendEmail(Text,JsonObject)
member.summary: Send email using Outlook API. If the message json parameter <= 4 mb and wrapped in a message object it is sent in a single request, otherwise it is sent it in multiple requests.
member.error: User is external and cannot authenticate to the exchange server.
member.param: Access token of the account.
The JSON representing the email message.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client.SendEmail(SecretText,JsonObject)
member.summary: Send email using Outlook API. If the message json parameter <= 4 mb and wrapped in a message object it is sent in a single request, otherwise it is sent it in multiple requests.
member.error: User is external and cannot authenticate to the exchange server.
member.param: Access token of the account.
The JSON representing the email message.

member.name: O:Interface::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client v3
member.summary: Interface for the Email - Outlook API Client v3 which allows retrieval of emails, replying to emails and marking emails as read.

member.name: M:Interface::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client v3.RetrieveEmails(SecretText,Boolean,Email - Outlook Account):JsonArray
member.summary: Retrieves the emails from the Outlook API.
member.param: The access token used for connecting to exchange via graph.
Whether to mark the retrieved email as read.
The email account to retrieve emails from.
The emails retrieved from exchange.

member.name: M:Interface::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client v3.RetrieveEmail(SecretText,Text[250],Text,Boolean):JsonObject
member.summary: Retrieves an email from the Outlook API.
member.param: The access token used for connecting to exchange via graph.
The email address of the mailbox.
The external message id of the message to retrieve.
member.returns: The json containing the information of the email.

member.name: M:Interface::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Client v3.CreateDraftReply(SecretText,Text[250],Text):Text
member.summary: Creates a draft reply to a specific email.
member.param: The access token used for connecting to exchange via graph.
The email address of the mailbox.
The external message id of the message to create a reply for.
member.returns: The external message id of the created draft.

member.summary: Replies to an email.

The email address of the mailbox.
The email message containg the response for replying to the email.

member.summary: Marks an email as read.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Helper.EmailOutlookAccountAddressValidation(Email - Outlook Account@)
member.summary: The current user connector does not store the actual email address but can be retrieved from the email accounts as it subsitutes the placeholder value. The email address is validated and if it is not valid, the email address is replaced with the proper one from calling GetAllAccounts in EmailAccount codeunit.
member.param: The retrieved email outlook account.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Helper.KeepLastMessageOnly(Text):Text
member.summary: Keep only the last message in the email body.
member.param: Email body.
member.remarks: The last message is the message that is the reply to the email. The history of the email is removed.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Helper.RemoveOutlookHistory(Text):Text
member.summary: Removes the history from emails that are sent from new Outlook client.

member.name: M:Codeunit::System#Email#Email - Outlook API Helper.RemoveOldOutlookHistory(Text):Text
member.summary: Removes the history from emails that are sent from old Outlook client.
